features: REPAIR HAIR FROM THE INSIDE: Want strong and deeply nourished hair? Nexxus Therappe & Humectress Shampoo and Conditioner for Dry Hair is designed to help rescue and visibly repair dry hair
LOCK IN MOISTURE, UNLEASH SMOOTH HAIR: With Elastin Protein and Caviar Complex, this shampoo and conditioner will leave your hair feeling silky from morning to night and help retain natural movement
ULTIMATE MOISTURE: Transform your dry locks into smooth and shiny locks, as if you just came from the salon. The Nexxus shampoo and conditioner duo works together to help repair and rejuvenate hair
SALON-CRAFTED HAIR CARE: Nexxus moisturizing shampoo and conditioner helps replenish and repair hair, leaving it revitalized without weighing it down, giving it flexibility and suppleness every day
NEXXUS HAIR CARE PRODUCTS: Repair dry hair with our hair products that are silicone free. Born in salons and perfected by science, using high-performing technology and precious ingredients
THE SCIENCE OF PROTEINS: Nexxus scientists use leading-edge research called Proteomics to create its hair protein treatment because Nexxus knows hair structure consists of up to 90% protein.
body.description: Salon-crafted with Nexxus’ exclusive Caviar & Protein Complex, this shampoo and conditioner pair helps nourish hair and deliver deep hydration, fortifying the surface of hair to lock moisture in for 24 hours.Our Moisturizing Shampoo has a lightweight, silicone-free formula that revitalizes hair without weighing it down, helping to give hair the flexibility and suppleness needed to retain its natural movement. Ultimate Moisture Humectress Conditioner provides advanced conditioning to help replenish and reawaken hair, unleashing your hair’s natural smoothness all day long.Repairing hair is a multi-step process. For best results, apply Moisture Shampoo for dry hair to damp hair, massaging into a rich lather before rinsing thoroughly. Follow with the Humectress Conditioner, smoothing onto wet hair and waiting 3 minutes before rinsing. For optimized results, use Humectress Hair Masque and finish with Luxe Lightweight Conditioning Hair Mist to lock in moisture. Both Therappe Shampoo and Humectress Conditioner are suitable for everyday use.A leader in salon-quality hair products, Nexxus uses learnings from science and nature. Nexxus uses advanced scientific methods to identify the protein needs of each hair type and create customized formulas with proteins to bring your hair back to life.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Nexxus Therappe & Humectress is a salon-quality shampoo and conditioner designed to help rescue and moisturize dry hair for 24 hours. Nexxus continues to pioneer and innovate, creating salon-crafted haircare that's inspired by nature's most powerful ingredients.

The Full Range Complement your shampoo and conditioner with a moisture masque and conditioning mist for softer, smoother hair. The Experts Nexxus uses the latest trends and technologies to create innovative hair products, like our shampoo and conditioner, to replenish hair for ultimate moisture. The Ingredients With Elastin Protein and Caviar Complex, Nexxus Therappe and Humectress Shampoo and Conditioner provide deep conditioning with a silky smooth feel. The Results Nexxus Rehydrating shampoo and conditioner provide salon-quality hair care for smooth, luxurious results.

HUMECTRESS ENCAPSULATE SERUM FOR NORMAL TO DRY HAIR HUMECTRESS CONDITONING MIST HUMECTRESS MOISTURE MASQUE FOR DRY HAIR Main Benefit Rebuilding serum to gradually bring hair back to its pre-damaged state. Lightweight hair mist that softens hair and retains flexibility. Salon-crafted hair mask with protein for nourished and protected hair.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nexxus Therappe and Humectress - Salvation for Thin, Dry Hair!
reviews.reviewText: I've finally found the perfect solution for my thin, dry hair - the Nexxus Shampoo and Conditioner Therappe Humectress duo. This set has worked wonders and has become a holy grail for transforming my hair into a luscious, moisturized mane.The shampoo, with its silicone-free formula, is a game-changer for those with thin hair. It cleanses without weighing my hair down, and the Moisturizing Caviar Complex ensures that my locks stay hydrated and healthy. The scent is delightful, adding a luxurious touch to my daily shower routine.The Humectress conditioner complements the shampoo perfectly. Its silicone-free and rich formula is an absolute treat for dry hair. The Elastin Protein works like magic, leaving my hair feeling soft, silky, and incredibly manageable. Even with my thin hair, it doesn't feel weighed down or greasy.What sets this set apart is the generous 33.8 oz size. It's a long-lasting supply that ensures I don't run out of this haircare magic anytime soon. The pump design is convenient and mess-free, making it easy to dispense the perfect amount every time.After consistent use, my hair feels revitalized, and I've noticed a significant improvement in its overall health and texture. The Nexxus Therappe and Humectress set has become a non-negotiable part of my hair care routine, and I can't recommend it enough for those with thin, dry hair. It's a game-changer that delivers on its promises and more. Say goodbye to dry hair days!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 16, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Amazing for Fine, Tangly Hair
reviews.reviewText: I’ve tried so many different shampoos over the years, but I believe this will be the one I become loyal to! I have fine hair and I was experiencing really bad issues with it getting tangled easily. I’d used other hydrating shampoos and name brands like Redken to solve this issue but it never got better. I ordered this and have used it for a few months now and it has made such a difference in my hair!! I can always easily brush through my hair now, even when I leave it natural! No more tangles! On top of that, my hair feels so soft, healthy and shiny now. I’d recommend this shampoo and conditioner to anyone!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This product works so well. My hair was completely damaged after the second use my hair was back to normal really love this product so much will I always again

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars How to open the pump
reviews.reviewText: Hold the ring to prevent it from turning, turn the pump counter clockwise until you hear 2 clicks. Not click click, but click........click. The pump will pop up. Hope that prevents any frustrations. I messed with it for a while, lol.
